pageTitle: Travel information for car travel to CCH – Congress Center Hamburg - CCH - Congress Center Hamburg
textBeforeTable: Motorway travel A visual impression is shown on the locator map “Travel to Hamburg”. If you come to CCH - Congress Center Hamburg by car or motor bike, it is best to take the motorways and exits shown under “Motorway travel”. Then follow the signs to “Messe / CCH”. textAfterTable: Notes for automotive navigation systems The address to enter is Marseiller Straße 1, 20355 Hamburg Some navigations may list the CCH - Congress Center Hamburg as "special target" The geo-coordinates for CCH - Congress Center Hamburg are: N 53° 33' 33.39" E 9° 59' 10" Parking facilities Car park Charges Capacity/Information Underground garage CCH / Trade Fair (entrance height: 1.90m) Hourly rate, with different hourly charges and maximum charges depending on the event at Hamburg Fair about 900 spaces Underground garage East (Bei d. Kirchhöfen, Entrance B5, entrance height: 2.10 m) Hourly rate, with different hourly charges and maximum charges depending on the event at Hamburg Fair about 880 spaces
